if you mean the 'console' you would have to proberly edit the /boot/grub/menu.lst and enable the proper framebuffer modes..

back with my console resolution problem, the fault was my custom kernel, i mean, update-initramfs isn't adding vesafb, fbcon, softcursor etc modules to its initrd, but it is adding those modules to stock kernels
